page.title: 14PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: The interviewee lives in a bungalow. She has only got one neighbour.She moved into the village in 1969.Since she moved to the village,the only thing that has really changed is the drainage system.At first it drained into the village pond,then part of it got filled in,and every time it rained the whole place flooded.The drainage system was rearranged and now it's alright.Her hobby/job is horse riding, eventing and MAINLY teaching people to compete.Her bungalow is surrounded by lots of bridleways and countryside.The village is always very peaceful.She uses the village church,but she thinks the congregation is too small.On Christmas Eve people sing carols on a farmer's tractor and trailer.The oldest house is the cottage,built in the 1400's,on the road to Newfound.Her house was built in the 1940's.
